## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lesson students will be able to:

1. Summarize the Tidy Data philosophy and associated principles
2. Construct a "Tidy" spreadsheet for data capture
3. Create a `Readme` file for storing metadata

## Lesson Outline

\setlength{\baselineskip}{1.5\baselineskip}

- Review Learning Objectives and Agenda (9:00)
- Review readings:
    - Tidy Data (9:05)
    - Spreadsheet demo (9:10)
    - `Readme` metadata template demo (9:15)
- Questions/Discussion/Independent work (9:20)
- Review Learning Objectives (10:10)
